title: [Skin Concept] Ravenborn Quinn
body:
Hey guys,

Just wanted to share a 2-D concept I put together for Ravenborn Quinn. I think this thematic would fit her quite nicely!

http://i.imgur.com/BEayzJJ.png"

Let me know what you all think :)

Cheers

replies.body: Ah, I love this! Very beautiful. I would love to see a darker Valor. WINGSSSSS
I think a vampire skin would also fit for her(or swain once he can get skins again/as a legendary skin),changing their birds into bats.
She should have a skin which looks like she is the wife of Swain. Complete fantasy but possible.
Thanks, and I'm with you on that one!
I always wanted to see a noxian quinn with beatrice as valor, and a demacian swain with valor as beatrice :P
i dig it! quinn's a character that could be really interesting with some darker skins, and i love the idea of her morphing into a raven for her ult (or growing raven wings? either would be super rad)

> [{quoted}](name=great caretaker,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=95AiuBAk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-02T18:13:12.862+0000)
>
> i love the idea of her morphing into a raven for her ult

rito pls.
Tyrant Quinn would be a cool name. Ravenborn fits this concept  better, but I think a seperate skin called Tyrant would be cool with her growing wings or morphing into a raven.
Oooh! As a Quinn main I would love this to pieces.

I love quinn and this makes me want!
Skin it Riot!  DO IT NOW!
lol

Adorable! I love it. Ive never played Quinn but maybe when she ults it can play a Crow sound?
Love,
         Excellia
{{champion:202}}

It'd look weird to see someone dressed up nice fighting the way Quinn does
Also if we wanted a darker Quinn how about Blood Raven design that looked dope AF

Project, Dragonmaster, Dragon slayer, Commando, Pool Party, Headhunter...

Imo Ravenborn just seems something mages would have, like leblanc. Looks dumb on a marksman.  And I highly doubt Quinn would dress up like that...Just sayin, you probably figured it out by now she is not the typical "girly" type. And this skin is very feminine and girly. Something a witch/mage/caster would look good with. Sucks how Vayne is getting all the skins Quinn should have gotten.

Aye, I agree the Ravenborn thematic has a very magical feeling to it at its core, something that's attuned to the more caster-y types of the League roster. I wouldn't say that's problematic in this case, though -- skins are meant to explore alternate fantasies and themes for different Champions (hello, Elderwood LeBlanc), and that's exactly what I wanted to do here with Ravenborn Quinn, which is why I didn't mind giving her an outfit that she would perhaps be too conservative to wear in the main canon. 

That being said, I do think blending "marksman" and "magic-wielder" can lead to some very fun and interesting results. I didn't even design her crossbow with functionality in mind because, in my head canon, it's powered by magic. Likewise, I can't imagine that Valor would be able to carry her with that size, so she'd have to travel around in her ult through some other unconventional means.

Ultimately, I felt Ravenborn was a good match for Quinn because it helped me play up her avian theme with a twist, while also taking the skin line in an unexpected direction by giving it to a marksman (similar to how Orianna got a Heartseeker skin, which was unprecedented for a mage). I know not everyone's gonna like it, though, so in any case, thanks for your feedback/critique!
